org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield
Class ForceFieldTools

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield.ForceFieldTools

public abstract class ForceFieldTools
extends java.lang.Object

To work with the coordinates of the molecule, like get the 3d coordinates of the atoms or calculate the distance between two atoms.

Author:
vlabarta
Created on:
2005-03-03

                                                               int atom1Position,
                                                               int atom2Position)
Calculate 3d distance between two atoms in one molecule from its 3xN coordinate vector.

Parameters:
coords3d - Molecule 3xN coordinates.
atom1Position - Atom position in the molecule (from 0 to N-1) for the first atom.
atom2Position - Atom position in the molecule (from 0 to N-1) for the second atom.
Returns:
Distance between the two atoms.

Calculate 3d distance between two atoms in one molecule from its N coordinates 3d

Parameters:
atoms3dCoordinates - Vector with the N coordinates 3d
atomNum1 - Atom position in the 3xN coordinates vector (from 0 to N-1) for the first atom.
atomNum2 - Atom position in the 3xN coordinates vector (from 0 to N-1) for the second atom.
Returns:
Distance between the two atoms in the molecule.
